name: HomeControlFlexSecurityPanelControl
0:
”Alexa, open Home Control Flex”
”Alexa, ask Home Control Flex if my system is armed”
”Alexa, tell Home Control Flex to arm my system”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home control flex
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the HomeControl Flex Security Panel Control skill for Amazon Alexa, you can now
1. Use HomeControl Flex to arm your security system using Amazon Alexa voice control.
2. Use HomeControl Flex to check the current state of your security system.

To use the HomeControl Flex Security Panel Control skill for Amazon Alexa, you must be a HomeControl Flex subscriber and have the HomeControl Flex interactive service.

After the Telguard device is activated and configured for HomeControl Flex interactive service, enable the “HomeControl Flex Security Panel Control” skill within the skills section of the Alexa App to link your HomeControl Flex account. 

After linking the HomeControl Flex Security Panel Control skill for Amazon Alexa, you can say things like:

“Alexa, open HomeControl Flex.”
“Alexa, ask HomeControl Flex if my system is armed.”
“Alexa, tell HomeControl Flex to Arm my system.”

For additional information, please visit the HomeControl Flex FAQ at HomeControlFlex.com or contact your security dealer.
